thread.title: Why grandparents and siblings are key for early autism diagnosis
thread.title_full: Why grandparents and siblings are key for early autism diagnosis

author: Michelle Stein
title: Why grandparents and siblings are key for early autism diagnosis
text:
by Michelle Stein posted in Parenting Early diagnosis plays an important role in the effectiveness of treatment for children with autism spectrum disorder (ASD) and usually, it's the people closest to a child who first notice the signs. Certain family members, however, seem to be particularly instrumental for diagnoses. New research published in...

Want to get the full story? Click on the headline above. And thanks for reading the BabyCenter Blog.
